text: Ron Jeremy (born 1953) is a former American pornographic film actor, filmmaker, actor, and stand-up comedian. Nicknamed "The Hedgehog", Jeremy was ranked by AVN at No. 1 in their "50 Top Porn Stars of All Time" list. Jeremy has also made a number of non-pornographic media appearances, and director Scott J. Gill filmed a documentary about him and his legacy, entitled Porn Star: The Legend of Ron Jeremy, which was released in 2001. ==Pornographic films== {| class="wikitable" ! Year ! Film ! Role !
